original: <color=#FFE787>回復時間：</color><color=#ccffcc>$Skill_CD(2241)@</color>在武將身前召喚生死門，吞噬周圍的敵人，同時以<color=#ccffcc>$Skill_Int(2241)@</color><color=#13ccd7>智力</color>對敵人造成法術傷害。
text: <color=#FFE787>Response time: </color><color=#ccffcc>$Skill_CD(2241)@</color> Summon the gate of life and death in front of the generals, swallow the enemies around, and use <color=# ccffcc>$Skill_Int(2241)@</color><color=#13ccd7>Int</color> causes spell damage to the enemy.
